itemDescription: Scottish footballer, played professionally from 1921 to 1932

wikipedia_page.main: John Ross Black (26 May 1900 – December 1993) was a Scottish professional footballer who usually played as an outside forward or wing half.

response: John Black may refer to:
*John Black (baseball) (1890–1962), Major League Baseball first baseman
*John Black (footballer, born 1900) (1900–1993), Scottish footballer

Black married in Clydebank in 1920. His brother John Black (born 1900) also played football for various Football League teams.
